actions.schemaXml:
<Field ID="{639c0dd5-633f-4a08-84bd-a274376c18ae}"
             Name="DITFTAItemChangeType"
             DisplayName="Change Type"
             Type="Text"
             Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{2e21b074-b6a3-439d-82b7-c7e7d14b9432}"
             Name="DITFTAChangeDescription"
             DisplayName="Description"
             Type="Note"
             Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{e7685f8c-2af8-4e13-9016-dec0a2d6156b}"
             Name="DITFTAItemIsDeleted"
             DisplayName="Is Deleted"
             Type="Boolean"
             Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{a41b91dc-d65d-445d-a41e-a4561694072d}"
             Name="DITFTAChangeUserName"
             DisplayName="Change User Name"
             Type="Text"
             Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{ac9a27d5-8fa8-4aeb-9bc6-5dd662de84ae}"
             Name="DITFTAItemInternalName"
             DisplayName="Internal Name"
             Type="Text"
             Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{147464d7-1e89-4231-938d-61457fb6fa39}" 
       Name="DITFTALookupPermissionAreaType"  
       DisplayName="Area Type"  
       Type="Lookup"  
       Required="TRUE"  
       ShowField="Title"  
       List="Lists/DITPermissionType"  Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{34f66661-b014-482e-8e48-22cca147e2b4}"
             Name="DITFTAAreaType"
             DisplayName="Area Type"
             Type="Choice"
           Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" >
        <CHOICES>
          <CHOICE>Site</CHOICE>
          <CHOICE>Policy</CHOICE>
          <CHOICE>Trade Agreement</CHOICE>
        </CHOICES>
      </Field>

<Field ID="{0fca4323-e99e-48bf-8479-f376ec6b06f7}"
             Name="DITFTAItemDescription"
             DisplayName="Description"
             Type="Text"
             Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{8b38fec6-6bc5-47be-997d-858a81256687}"
             Name="DITFTAItemStatus"
             DisplayName="Status"
             Type="Text"
             Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{20b62321-9de8-435e-98f4-1f48574de29b}"
             Name="DITFTAItemIsDisabled"
             DisplayName="Is Disabled"
             Type="Boolean"
             Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{e8873455-cb51-49ea-877b-1d5007b2b0bb}"
            Name="DITFTAItemDisplayOrder"
            DisplayName="Display Order"
            Type="Number"
            Required="FALSE"
            Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{b1650ea1-1e32-4f29-a14e-12e4862dcc87}"
            Name="DITFTAChangeItemID"
            DisplayName="ItemID"
            Type="Number"
            Required="FALSE"
            Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{2f78379f-db0f-4fef-bd36-12fc303f59d8}"
             Name="DITFTAUserName"
             DisplayName="User"
             Type="User"
             Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{e24f038d-7029-459c-b1cb-3c19df481992}"
             Name="DITFTAUserNames"
             DisplayName="Users"
             Type="UserMulti"
             Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" />

<Field ID="{1384fdf4-f3ff-4aad-8b59-665827265fd9}"
             Name="DITFTAUserRole"
             DisplayName="Role"
             Type="Choice"
           Required="FALSE"
             Group="DIT FTA" >
        <CHOICES>
          <CHOICE>Owner</CHOICE>
          <CHOICE>Member</CHOICE>
          <CHOICE>Visitor</CHOICE>
          <CHOICE>Restricted Viewer</CHOICE>
        </CHOICES>
      </Field>

<Field ID="{0b8840ad-b637-4f7a-a287-fe8449600b72}" 
       Name="DITFTALookupPermArea"  
       DisplayName="Permission Area"  
       Type="Lookup"  
       Required="TRUE"  
       ShowField="Title"  
       List="Lists/DITPermissionArea"></Field>
